column1: Little Goat Diner////I want to come back and try their milkshakes
column3: and bakery items.  They appear to serve breakfast
column5: and dinner all day.  If you're not sitting on the patio
column8: and a bit loud.  After brunch
column9: I recommend hopping around some of the bars in the West Loop.  There is so much going on in "restaurant row" that you can easily spend the entire day here.
